required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Laser Therapy Versus Anterior Re-positioning Splint in the Treatment of Disc Displacement With Reduction
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Laser Irradiation Versus Anterior Repositioning Splint in Treatment of Disc Displacement With Reduction A Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: comparing the effects of Laser therapy with anterior re-positioning splint and a placebo group on clinical signs and symptoms of temporo-mandibular dis-function and assessing articular disc morphology and configuration with magnetic resonance imaging.

detailed_description.textblock: to compare the clinical effects of Laser therapy as assessed with research diagnostic criteria of temporo-mandibular disorders to a group that received anterior re-positioning splint therapy and a control group that received placebo Laser. Diagnosis for disc displacement with reduction was performed with magnetic resonance imaging before treatment. assessment of the clinical and MRI findings was again performed after a 3 months observation period.

primary_outcome.measure: Level of temporomandibular joint pain: assessed by using subjective visual analogue scale
primary_outcome.description: current level of temporomandibular joint pain assessed by using subjective visual analogue scale from 1 to 10 according to the research diagnostic criteria of temporomandibular disorders diagnostic sheets, zero indicates no pain, while 10 indicates the worst pain

secondary_outcome.description: joint sound., it is a binary measurement assessed by hand palpation

mouth opening, measured between the incisal edges of upper and lower incisors using a digital caliper, right and left mandibular movements, measured from upper dental midline to lower dental midline using a digital caliper.

change in articular disc morphology and configuration using two dimensional measurements on a DICOM viewer software including both linear and angular measurements in relation to cartesian coordinates X and Y

arm_group.description: anterior re-positioning splint worn for 8 hours during night time for 3 months
placebo laser for 12 sessions over 3 months

intervention.description: epic model biolase with an output of 4W, 1800 J wavelength with a continuous Laser mode.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients having TMD in the form of disc displacement with reduction as verified from signs and symptoms during clinical examination and confirmed from the MRI.
2. Good general health: The patient must be medically free from any systemic disease or health problems.
3. Adult patients 18 years old and above.
4. No previous orthodontic treatment.
5. No previous TMJ treatment or surgery.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients with multiple missing posterior teeth.
2. Muscle pain due to systemic disease.
3. Dental related pain.
4. Congenital abnormality, neoplasia or acute trauma.
5. Previous TMJ treatment or surgery.
6. Any medical condition that prohibits MRI acquisition.

overall_official.affiliation: Professor of Orthodontics, Faculty of Dentistry, Cairo Universitye
